mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_WISH (ID, MEMBER_ID, PLAN_ID) VALUES (SEQ_WISH.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{planId})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, MEMBER_ID, PLAN_ID FROM TBL_WISH WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT W.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID, P.ID AS PLAN_ID, P.PLAN_NAME AS PLAN_NAME, C.COURSE_FILE_PATH AS COURSE_FILE_PATH, C.COURSE_FILE_NAME AS COURSE_FILE_NAME FROM TBL_WISH W JOIN TBL_PLAN P ON W.PLAN_ID = P.ID JOIN TBL_COURSE C ON P.COURSE_ID = C.ID WHERE W.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY W.CREATED_DATE DESC ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRow}

SELECT PLAN_ID, PLAN_NAME, COURSE_FILE_PATH, COURSE_FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT PLAN_ID, PLAN_NAME, COURSE_FILE_PATH, COURSE_FILE_NAME, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT WP.ID AS PLAN_ID, WP.PLAN_NAME AS PLAN_NAME, C.COURSE_FILE_PATH AS COURSE_FILE_PATH, C.COURSE_FILE_NAME AS COURSE_FILE_NAME FROM TBL_WISH W JOIN TBL_PLAN WP ON W.PLAN_ID = WP.ID JOIN TBL_COURSE C ON WP.COURSE_ID = C.ID WHERE W.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY WP.ID DESC ) IQ WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pagination.endRow} ) WHERE RN >= #{pagination.startRow}
